summary: As President of Blackboard International, I’m responsible for  Blackboard's business outside the United States and Canada, bringing our innovative technologies and solutions to learners worldwide.Prior to joining Blackboard in 2015, I served as the SVP of Global Sales at Velocity, as well as Vice President of  Worldwide Sales for the Smarter Infrastructure business for IBM.On a personal level, I am deeply passionate about civil rights, economic empowerment, human rights and poverty alleviation. I currently serve on the board of The Black Star Project, an organization committed to improving the quality of life in Black and Latino communities of Chicago and nationwide by eliminating the racial academic achievement gap.
name: Lee Blakemore
title: President, Blackboard International at Blackboard
